column3: â€œIn the challenge of great purple primates, Grape Ape is the alpha, with Purple Gorilla runner-up. Not as dense but just as sticky. Tastes of earth and citrus, very   diesel / skunk / chem / pungent, no noticeable grape flavor. Good anytime medication for pain, happiness and relaxation.â€
â€œThis shit sat me down after three hits. It's some of the best weed I've had in recent memory. I mean I couldn't walk for half an hour... âœŒï¸â€

â€œThis is the very dank. Dark purple and musky/earthy. The first time I enjoyed it, I took giant puffs and it snuck up on me. I was in a twilight state for hours. I felt no pain (I had been in terrible pain before smoking) and I could feel the smile lift my face a little more every so often. This strain is so dreamy I would take it to the home coming dance. 

I read somewhere that if you can, you should space your slee...â€

â€œBeautiful purple buds with an earthy but sweet  aroma. The burn is okay and the high is mellow , relaxing and makes you not too Tired. Considering it's mostly indica. But overall a great strain and beautiful buds you just don't want to break.â€

â€œSmells of Glue and brings a sweet aroma 
Features Dark Purple Buds all throughout with a heavy coat of trichomes and pistils

â€œTerrific strain! Deep purple flowers with a skunky/earthy aroma. Taste is out of this world, very purple-licious grapey/cherry flavor - possibly the best tasting strain I've ever tried. At ~18% thc this isn't the most potent strain but the buzz is quality - deeply relaxing warm indica body traits with a mellow euphoric head high. For me, not couch-locking strain, and maybe not the best for going straight to sleep. I'...â€

â€œI love this strain. I smoke regularly and feel like I have a somewhat high tolerance when I smoke. The Purple Gorilla hits fast but sits around like a soft comfy head-rest type feeling. It may not last like others but you can smoke it all night without it taking over. You can still function and cope with your tasks.â€

â€œIn my experience, this bud is darker with purple undertones. A very nice deep relaxation effect being as it is indica dominate. The smell is sweet-earthy with a pungent like grape aroma. Also seems to be a very smooth smoker as well which surprised me. All around a very friendly bud to try!â€
